title: protection of the euro against counterfeiting, as amended by Council Regulation
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as 

the European Union 

(Counterfeiting of Euro) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 3rd day of August
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (counterfeiting euro) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall come operation 3rd day august

title: protection of the euro against counterfeiting, as amended by Council Regulation
protection of the euro against counterfeiting, as amended by Council Regulation
heading: 2. The Central Bank Act 1942 (No. 22 of 1942) is amended -
text_raw:
2. The Central Bank Act 1942 (No. 22 of 1942) is amended - 

(a) 

in section 2(2A) – 

(i) 

in paragraph (ba) (inserted by Regulation 5 of the European 
Union (Sustainability-related Disclosures in the Financial 
Services Sector) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 146 of 2021)), 
by the substitution of “2019;” for “2019.”, and 

(ii) by the insertion of the following paragraphs after paragraph 

(ba): 

“(bb) Council Regulation (EC) No. 1338/2001 of 28 June 
20011 laying down measures necessary for the 
protection of the euro against counterfeiting, as 
amended by Council Regulation (EC) No. 44/2009 of 
18 December 20082; 

(bc) Regulation (EU) No. 1210/2010 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 15 December 20103 

1 OJ No. L181, 4.7.2001, p.6 
2 OJ No. L17, 22.1.2009, p.1 
3 OJ No. L339, 22.12.2010, p.1 
4 OJ No. L267, 9.10.2010, p.1 
5 OJ No. L253, 20.9.2012, p.19 
6 OJ No. L330, 20.12.2019, p.91 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd August, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [408] 3 

concerning authentication of euro coins and handling 
of euro coins unfit for circulation; 

(bd) Decision ECB/2010/14 of the European Central Bank 
of 16 September 20104 on the authenticity and fitness 
checking and recirculation of euro banknotes, as 
amended by Decision ECB/2012/19 of 7 September 
20125 and by Decision ECB/2019/2195 of 5 
December 20196.”, 

and 

(b) 

in Part 1 of Schedule 2 by the insertion of the following: 

“49 No. 16 of 2021 Counterfeiting Act 2021 Part 3”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 July, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [408]
